'''Mythcon 16''' was the sixteenth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "A Kinship of Dancers: Interplay in the Lives and Works of [[C.S. Lewis|Lewis]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]], and [[Charles Williams|Williams]]"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Patricia A. McKillip (fantasy author) and Peter Schakel (Lewis scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' Diana Lynne Pavlac
